price: Tu Señor concede Sus gracias a la gente, pero la mayoría no agradece.
arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَذُو فَضۡلٍ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna rabbaka ladhū faḍlin ʿalā al-nāsi walākinna aktharahum lā yashkurūna
